title: ‘PM & Cabinet must resign, & pave way for new all party government’ – Dullas tells President
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Minister Dullas Alahapperuma has requested the President to pave the way for the formation of a new all-party government, by calling for the resignation of the Prime Minister and the entire cabinet of Ministers.
‘PM & Cabinet must resign, & pave way for new all party government’ – Dullas tells President
